title: How to watch or download web series for free - Quora

response.answer_text: Now a days, web series are best and trending entertainment option. Many great creators like ALT Balaji, MX Player, Ullu etc. and on Youtube The Viral Fever, The Timeliners, The Screen Patti, etc. are creating great dramas, thriller, and in all categories. Also we should not forget about ‘Sacred Games’ which is one of the best series released yet. Some VOD [Video On Streaming] platforms are paid but they produce worthy shows Paid VOD: Netflix, Amazon Prime Some VOD’s are free too! Free VOD:Channels On YouTube,MX Player I would like to suggest MX Player because it is free and stream almost all indian webseries!  Image From Google Why MX Player? It is also available in app.It streams plenty of shows such as FLAMES, Pitchers, etc.You can watch ALT Balaji Shows too which are paid on their platforms.And after all it is free.If you are unsatisfied with MX Player then you can go for paid platforms too. [Amazon Prime, Netflix] which costs arround 129–500 INR per month. Alternative For MX Player : VOOT.COM Thanks! Make sure to hit that arrow!

You can watch your favourite webseries without subscribing to paid OTT platforms by downloading through TELEGRAM app. All you have to do is 1.Download Telegram app. 2.Click on search symbol. 3.Now search for some channels like “Netflix Web Series” or something or type the series name you want to watch you will get some suggestions. 4.Now click on those channel names and search for the webseries. 5.If the file is present in that channel you can download or else you have to search in other channel. Hope this helps. Happy Watching
